SEARCH
Package player

Class ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
player.Player
player.ComputerPlayer
public class ComputerPlayer extends Player
Represents a computer player in the Connect 4 game.

It currently uses random selections to determine the move.

See Also:

    • ComputerPlayer

      public ComputerPlayer(String name, BoardCell checker)
      Constructs a new ComputerPlayer instance with the specified name and checker type.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the computer player.
      checker - a BoardCell instance representing the player's checker.

  • Method Details

    • getMove

      public int getMove(Board board)
      Generates a random valid column number for the computer player's current move.
      Specified by:
      getMove in class Player
      Parameters:
      board - a Board instance representing the current state of the game board.
      Returns:
      the validated column index (0-based) where the player wants to drop the checker.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is no available column for the computer player to drop the checker.
